Description:
Increases the effect of Reinforce, Insulate, and Courage by 50%.
Reinforce on target increases Physical damage by +1 per Infuse charge.
Insulate on target increases Elemental damage by +1 per Infuse charge.
Courage on target increases Mystical damage by +1 per Infuse charge.
DescriptionExtended:
Increases the effect of Reinforce, Insulate, and Courage by 50%.
Reinforce on target increases Physical damage by +1 per Infuse charge.
Insulate on target increases Elemental damage by +1 per Infuse charge.
Courage on target increases Mystical damage by +1 per Infuse charge.
Maximum charges 10.
Remove 1 charge at the end of the turn.
